page.title: 07Simon's Weekend - Saturday
page.content: I live with my Mum and Dad and two cats called Ming and Chin. My sister lives in San Francisco. On Saturday I woke up at 6.30 am.I watched children's television and then had pancakes and maple syrup followed by bacon and eggs for breakfast. We all went shopping in Dovercourt. We went to the library to borrow some books as well as buying food. For lunch I cooked grilled cheese sandwiches supervised by Daddy. After lunch my friend Daniel came to play.We rode our bikes and played with my train set in the loft. Mummy planted out some seeds and Daddy watched some sport on T.V. At 6pm. we had dinner which was beefburgers,new potatoes,broccoli and leeks. I went to bed at 8pm after Daddy read me a story.
